product_name: MACFast Response Moisturizing Eye Cream with Caffeine
summary: SummaryMAC Fast Response Depuff Eye Cream is a super-charged, caffeinated moisturizer that produces instant effects. This cream makes skin around the eyes feel tighter and special optical diffusers diminish the appearance of fine lines and dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydratingReduces appearance of fine linesReduces appearance of dark circlesTighteningDermatologist-testedOphthalmologist-testedDoes not cause acneFeaturesFirming eye creamDe-puffingFormulated WithoutFragranceOilFormaldehydeHydroquinoneTriclosanCoal TarTolueneSodium Laureth SulfateGlutenPhthalateParabenMineral OilPetrolatumPolyethyleneLauryl SulfateOxybenzoneItem 2510698How To UseDab a small amount of eye cream on a fingertip and pat gently onto freshly cleansed eye area.IngredientsDimethicone, Isododecane, Water / Aqua / Eau, Polysilicone-11, Polyethylene, Butylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hexyldecyl Stearate, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Retinyl Palmitate, Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'orge, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Centella Asiatica (Hydrocotyl) Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Squalane, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Phytosphingosine, Quaternium-18 Bentonite, Propylene Carbonate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone, PEG / PPG-18 / 18 Dimethicone, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol.Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dab a small amount of eye cream on a fingertip and pat gently onto freshly cleansed eye area.
ingredients: Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure
Phenoxyethanol.Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: Just what I needüëèüèº
reviews.comments:
I've used different eye creams from cheap to expensive ones. This one is just my favorite . It helps with my puffy eyes. It makes my eye area look bright. 
Its soft and doesn't accentuate my wrinkles when I use foundation. I've used this cream for 5 years now and its my favorute . üí™üèºüí™üèº

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I love thisbeye cream! It really does get rid of puffiness and lines!

reviews.headline: Soothing
reviews.comments: This cream seems to help with the puffiness I experience after taking off makeup. Also, when one takes off makeup the skin around the eyes feels a little "traumatized" from all the wiping. This stuff will instantly calm the area around the eyes.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I continue to purchase this product;   it is the BEST. for sensitive eyes.

reviews.headline: This is a lost.
reviews.comments: This eye cream didn't perform well. Didn't do as it advertised. Nothing responsive about it. I will be returning it. I wanted it to work so bad. I gave it 2 stars because it did moisturized the area.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: Love this product.  See a difference immediately upon application!  Finally, a product that actually does what it claims to do!

reviews.headline: MUST HAVE
reviews.comments: I am seriously obsessed with this cream, it is the only product I have found that does not irritate my under eye area. It hydrates my under eyes and minimizes lines, highly recommend! When wearing makeup it can cake in the under the eye area, but if you apply this cream it keeps it smooth and cake-free!

reviews.headline: Awesome eye cream
reviews.comments: Fabulous eye cream for helping lines and circles.

reviews.headline: caused really bad dry spots
reviews.comments: I used this a few times when I first bought it and started to notice really bad dry spots above my eyelids and under my eyes where I had applied the product. I stopped using it after I realized this but a couple weeks ago I decided to give it another shot (bc it was expensive) and I had the same reaction. However, before the dryness started it did make my under-eyes look great with concealer.

reviews.headline: My dermatologist is not recommending this product.
reviews.comments: My dermatologist is not recommending the eye cream because my skin is so sensitive and because I've had skin cancer in different areas,  Do not know what to do wit it.  Can it be returned.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again!
reviews.comments: As a woman over 45..its so hard to find a product that helps with the puffiness of eye bags..this on works!!! Noticeable difference after just a week!

reviews.headline: Yep!!
reviews.comments: So I used a tester of this a long time ago and I thought I remeber it having a tingle affect but the tube I just received did not , maybe a new formula?? Not sure but either way here my review... feels very soft and smooth when u apply it. No stickyness so that nice. It looks like it doesnt do much at first but on the days I dont wear it I look way more tired . Im 33 and dont have dark circles but im a mom and I basically look tired 24/7. My opinion is if you have under eye bags and looking tired is your concern this would work good for you. I would describe this as an under eye blurring cream for tired eyes. The texture is like a cream product and serium made a baby. Very smooth different texture then most products I've tried.

reviews.headline: I always come back to this over the years...
reviews.comments: It's the only eye moisturizer I can wear under concealer without worrying about smearing or too much greasiness.  I've been seduced by other brands but I always come back to this one.

reviews.headline: its ok
reviews.comments: it's ok but overpriced

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I like this stuff helped with my puffy eyes

reviews.headline: Fantastic!
reviews.comments: Everything makes my eyes tear and after trying COUNTLESS eye creams, THIS IS THE ONLY ONE THAT DOES NOT MAKE MY EYES TEAR. You'll love it!

reviews.headline: Silky smooth under eye treatment!
reviews.comments: I hope they never stop making this product! It is a wonderful base in the morning and works amazing under makeup. It is so velvety and smooth, so you don't have to worry about it making undereye makeup wonky, just make sure you let it dry for a few minutes first before applying makeup over it. You could almost use it solely for the priming aspects, but it awakens eyes in minutes! LOVE this product and highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: It works fine
reviews.comments: Yes i love it

reviews.headline: Not for me (super sensitive skin and dark circles)
reviews.comments: I don't know how many eye creams I have tried to help me with my dark circles and this cream will go into my list. I have hereditary dark circles and super sensitive skin specially in my eye area. I put it once a few hours later I felt like a burning sensation around my eyes and the next day my eyes were puffy. It looked like I cried the whole night. I tried a second time during the day hoping it was just bad luck but no I'm having reaction to this cream same feeling burning sensation, puffy eyes, and I looked like I was about to cry the whole day. I'm disappointed and feel like I'll never find an eye cream that will fit me.

reviews.headline: MAC another great product
reviews.comments: Love it!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Amazing at getting rid of eyes bags!
It's a wonderful moisturizer for day and night.

display_values: Amazing at getting rid of eyes bags!
It's a wonderful moisturizer for day and night.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using the Fast Response Eye Cream for more than 10 years. Why did I stick to this cream? Because my eye concealer does not cake or settle in the micro lines if I apply this underneath as moisturizer for my eyes. My eyes look great for my age; I don't show my age because I believe this has prevented my eyes from the lines around and under my eyes.
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm Hooked!

faceoff_negative.comments: The instant effects that it claims to have are very minimal at certain times. Then other times I see no instant effects at all. The description states special optics "act like magic" to fade away lines, there is nothing magic about it. I wish companies would stop making products to sound as if they are miracle products. It does leave the eye area feeling silky though and the formula is very smooth. I won't repurchase especially at the price it is.
faceoff_negative.headline: It's okay I guess.

rollup.name: Fast Response Moisturizing Eye Cream with Caffeine
